channel.title: math.GM updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.GM updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A Table of Generating Functions
item.description: arXiv:2308.04434v3 Announce Type: replace Abstract: This is a compendium of generating functions involving single, double sums and definite integrals. These generating functions also involve special functions in both the summand function and closed form solution.
item.dc:creator: Robert Reynolds

item.title: A Polynomial Ring Connecting Central Binomial Coefficients and Gould's Sequence
item.description: arXiv:2312.00302v5 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We establish a new link between the central binomial coefficients $\binom{2n}{n}$ and Gould's sequence through the construction of a specialized multivariate polynomial quotient ring. We introduce a generalized definition for our specific ring structure, characterized by ideals generated from elements defined by a type of polynomial recurrence relation. By exploring a particular variation of this structure, we demonstrate that expanding and evaluating polynomials within the ring yields both the central binomial coefficients and Gould's sequence. Furthermore, we present a method for calculating the binomial transforms of these well-known sequences by leveraging the unique properties of our ring. This work offers new insights into the connections between these combinatorial sequences and showcases the potential of our recursive quotient ring approach in sequence analysis.
item.dc:creator: Joseph M. Shunia
